app_description: If you re traveling to a new place or trying to learn a new language Quick Translate will help you overcome language barriers. With the voice translation feature you can dictate what you want to translate and have it read aloud by the app or read on your screen. With camera translation you can scan any picture or text with your camera to translate it into your language. You can enter the phrase you want to translate to get the result in text format or to hear the correct pronunciation.
